item.description: okay, I’m on a roll, wrote another short story/review. This one is about the bingo. item.description: I haven’t posted any updates on this site for a few months because I got Covid in March and my health is in the bin again. I’m not even close to where I was energy-wise but I am doing more. Make of that what you will. One of those doing-more-things involved writing a bizarro short story over 3 afternoons. I am just… a little bit sick of reality, I guess. Little bit sick of sincerity.
